document_data.name: Kara al-Zalim
document_data.nicknames: The Fierce Sword of the Sea
document_data.mainbody: Sultan '''Kara al-Zalim''', also called the '''Fierce Sword of the Sea''', was the ruler of [[Jumlat]] in the [[Pearl Cities]] region of [[west Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Personality: Kara was both cunning and ruthless. These traits made him extremely popular with Jumlat's wealthiest citizens.
document_data.History: Kara earned his reputation as a ruthless [[Corsair (kit)|corsair]] during countless raids against [[Gana]]'s fleet.
document_data.Relationships: Kara was the nephew of Jumlat's previous sultan and was chosen as the sultan's successor over his own children.
